doc.title: All Talking... All Singing... All Dancing
doc.plot: This behind the scenes, making of promo for the musical film _Boy Friend, The (1971)_ (qv) features cast and crew interviews, lots of behind the scenes footage of song and dance rehearsals, and some musical clips from the feature film. Much of the discussion concerns recreating the look and feel of the 1920's era or centers on the star actress 'Twiggy (I)' (qv).
